member.name: D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_FLAGS
member.summary: Describes the level of GPU-based validation to perform at runtime.

member.name: D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_FLAGS_NONE
member.summary: Default behavior; resource states, descriptors, and descriptor tables are all validated.

member.name: D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_FLAGS_DISABLE_STATE_TRACKING
member.summary: When set, GPU-based validation does not perform resource state validation which greatly reduces the performance cost of GPU-based validation. Descriptors and descriptor heaps are still validated.
